author: Manish Singh
title: Uber partners with Flipkart and BigBasket in India to deliver essential items
description: Uber is resuming some services in India as it looks to help other firms deliver grocery and other essential items in select parts of the country, nearly two weeks after New Delhi ordered a three-week lockdown for its 1.3 billion people. The American firm said…
content:
